comments.body: Nit: the methods of the `ConnectorStatusListener` and `TaskStatusListener` classes are in very different orders. It would help readability to have them in the same order. IMO, the order of the `TaskStatusListener` methods is nice because it follows the lifecycle.

Why is the order of these methods different than in `ConnectorStatusListener`? 

Also, the `TaskStatusListener` methods always forward the method to the delegate _last_, whereas the methods of the `ConnectorStatusListener` use a mixture. Let's make them consistent.
